channel.title: CVE Feed for Extend Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Extend Themes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-33686|2024-04-29T05:56:41.838Z -- Extend Themes -- Pathway
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Extend Themes Pathway, Extend Themes Hugo WP, Extend Themes Althea WP, Extend Themes Elevate WP, Extend Themes Brite, Extend Themes Colibri WP, Extend Themes Vertice.This issue affects Pathway: from n/a through 1.0.15; Hugo WP: from n/a through 1.0.8; Althea WP: from n/a through 1.0.13; Elevate WP: from n/a through 1.0.15; Brite: from n/a through 1.0.11; Colibri WP: from n/a through 1.0.94; Vertice: from n/a through 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-33688|2024-04-26T12:55:16.202Z -- Extend Themes -- Teluro
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Extend Themes Teluro.This issue affects Teluro: from n/a through 1.0.31.

item.title: CVE-2024-34809|2024-05-17T09:43:13.129Z -- Extend Themes -- EmpowerWP
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Extend Themes EmpowerWP.This issue affects EmpowerWP: from n/a through 1.0.21.

item.title: CVE-2024-2904|2024-03-26T09:45:57.977Z -- Extend Themes -- Calliope
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Extend Themes Calliope.This issue affects Calliope: from n/a through 1.0.33.
